text: 14.17 1 Ko 8.8 Nɨgɨm. God binɨb kɨlop dɨl kod mɨdeb, takaw anɨb ak tap mɨdup ñɨg ñɨŋɨnɨgabun akaŋ ma ñɨŋɨnɨgabun takaw ak mel. Takaw God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod mɨdeb anɨb ak pen anɨgɨl mɨdeb. God Kawnan ne ak binɨb ayɨp mɨdaknɨŋ, kɨli God agak tek kɨdek gɨl, kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨl gɨpal.
